Name: Summer Meetings
About the game: When Ryuto came back to his hometown from the university during summer vacations, he didn’t expect who he’d meet. Will he have an unforgettable summer? If so, why? You decide! A bit different approach to Visual Novel with multiple dating events and endings. In the game you can: take part in some dramas! go to a summer festival! end up alone and pathetic! **** step sister! The game has several hours of content (Try all possible, alternative scenarios!)
